title: PHPstr_getcsv()Function

metadata.description: Learn about PHPstr_getcsv()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Definition and Usage
The str_getcsv() function parses a string for fields in CSV format and 
returns an array containing the fields read.
Syntax
str_getcsv(
string,separator,enclosure,escape
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
string
Required. Specifies the string to parse
separator
Optional. A character that specifies the field separator. Default is comma ( , )
enclosure
Optional. A character that specifies the field enclosure character. Default is "
escape
Optional. A character that specifies the escape character. Default is backslash (\)
Technical Details
Return Value:
Returns the CSV fields in an array
PHP Version:
5.3.0+

★
+1

escape
Optional'.
